text: Aur issi tarah say hum ney her nabi kay dushman boht say shetan peda kiya thay kuch aadmi aur kuch jinn, jin mein say baaz baazon ko chikni chupri baaton ka waswasa daaltay rehtay thay takay unn ko dhokay mein daal den aur agar Allah Taalaa chahata to yeh aisay kaam na ker saktay so inn logon ko aur jo kuch yeh iftra perdaazi ker rahey hain uss ko aap rehney dijiye
